subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: His Knicks may be done for the year, but Phil Jackson needs to scrutinize the playoffs with a Zen-like focus and eyeball the body language of every prospective unrestricted free agent.
snippet: His Knicks may be done for the year, but Phil Jackson needs to scrutinize the playoffs with a Zen-like focus and eyeball the body language of every prospective unrestricted free agent.
